1.1.name: wordpress/redirect-all-types
1.1.description: This plugin makes redirecting of post, pages, and all custom post types easy. It adds a meta box to the edit/add screen of each, which the user can add a URL for redirection. Once saved, if you visit the post, page, or custom post type, you will be redirected to the inputted URL.
